original: 弘農華陰人，楊修為其子。清德有節，與袁氏皆為東漢末年世家大族，「四世太尉」。楊修被處死後，曹操曾前往慰問，楊彪道出：「愧無日磾先見之明，猶懷老牛舐犢之愛。」此即為老牛舐犢的出處。
text: Hongnong Huayin, Yang Xiu as his son. There are festivals in Qingde, and the Yuan clan belonged to the aristocratic family at the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty. After Yang Xiu was executed, Cao Cao went to give his condolences, and Yang Biao said
